/* Resettlement and deportation */ British Guinea of course wrong, but no sign I can find of discussion of British colonies in W. Africa. Only serious consideration was Madagascar.

/* Etymology and use of the term */ The term framed the Holocaust in the context of the Nazis' ideology, it was not chosen to obscure the intent or facts, as far as I know. However, there may be sources for this, so I'm just adding {{cn}} template.
